page.syntax: Formatted_String as C = MASK(C string,C template)

argument.name: template
argument.description: A character string containing formatting and space characters. Any non-space character may be used for formatting.

page.description: Replace spaces in template with characters of string.
page.discussion: MASK() inserts characters from Unformatted_String into Template_String to replace all of the spaces in Template_String and returns the newly formatted string. Non blank characters in Template_String are included in the output Formatted_String. To include a space in the Formatted_String, use the pipe character ( | ) in the Template_String.
